name: Name
social-msg: Allow your contacts/prospects to follow you on social network to stay informed of your recent publications.
enter-valid-email: Please enter a valid email address
title: Title
subject: Subject
howToPlanMessages: How to add a message for soon?
q1: How do I add messages for later?
s1: Adding messages for later is not available in the free package. You must subscribe to a monthly package to benefit from this service. Once you've subscribed to a package, go to Messages > Calendar and select a day from your calendar. In the window, fill in the required fields, select the contact group whose members you want to receive your message, select the time of sending and press 'Set' then 'Save'. Your message is saved for later.
